item.title: thanos
item.description:
Description

Thanos is a highly available metrics system that can be added on top of existing Prometheus deployments, providing a global query view across all Prometheus installations.

  • https://github.com/bitnami/charts/tree/main/bitnami/thanos

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
thanos-minio default ❌ thanos-minio 0 1 —
thanos-query default ❌ — 0 1 —
thanos-query-frontend default ❌ — 0 1 —

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

item.title: tigera-operator
item.description:
Description

Installs the Tigera operator for Calico

  • https://github.com/tigera/operator
  • https://github.com/projectcalico/calico

Overview

tigera-operator default ❌ — 64 2 Critical

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

🤖 tigera-operator
